title: Can you get banned for scamming mystery skins
body: i got scammed a mysteryskin but i took screen shot can i report it?

replies.body: As *Wolfess* mentioned, we'll need a bit more context (without using any names) so we can understand what actually happened. Thanks!

What do you mean by you got scammed a mystery skin. Can you give a bit more detail about what actually happened?
Also do not name any other player's name as that is considered naming and shaming. just give us some info so we know what this supposed scam involved.
